desc: Buy DIY swimming pool products online. We sell solar pool heating, pool pumps, fibreglass, resin, pool paints, Kreepy, Zodiac, Pool skim, Gemini and more! Ask us for installed prices to heat your pool near Gauteng, in Centurion, Middelburg and Witbank.

layout.text: DIY or we'll install for almost free in Centurion. T&C apply.
